name: Aaron Sloman
biography: A New Zealand native, Aaron came to the US thirteen years ago after a successful career at the Department of Internal Affairs and Unisys, and later Microsoft Corporation. During his seven years at Microsoft, Aaron served in several senior management teams participating in strategic partnerships and M&A activities. For four years, Aaron was a lead architect in Microsoft’s eBusiness team, building some of the largest eCommerce sites and customer portal properties on the Microsoft technologies.
